title: How are NCERT exampler books helpful for the NEET? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: NCERT exemplar books contains those questions and material which are completely concept based. Mcqs are there and even subjective questions are completely factual. So material there have questions from 2008/2005 before years. So yes it will help you if you use it along with other extra material for neet preparation.
